name: Kommerstate.ru
overview:
Kommerstate.ru is an effective tool and an easy way for brokers to find tenants and buyers via the Internet as well as for searchers to find the commercial properties that meet their requirements. The portal offers advanced marketing tools and interactive database. Brokers and Agents can post their ads on the website and promptly access their target audiences (clients looking for commercial real estate). Tenants and buyers can perform online searches for premises, buildings and commercial properties based on specific criteria.

The search can be performed in many ways, such as polygon map search and the ability to view all properties within this geographical area. Owners and Landlords can quickly establish direct contacts with professional brokers, consultants and partners to get help during the signing of a deal or in the day to day property and facility management.

Kommerstate.ru is based on the experience of leading websites for commercial real estate in Western markets.

CEO of Kommerstate, Eugenia Vladimirova, is a professional with unique background that combines experience in internet industry and commercial real estate.

The initial funding of the company was made by Fast Lane Ventures.
